description:
One is the most striking Monster Jam™ truck on the Monster Jam™ circuit. Classified as a "SUV from the future", 14 times Monster Jam™ World Racing Champion and ready to destroy everything in its path. The other was created in late 2013 to encore a futuristic police vehicle. Together, they are Maximum Destruction™ (in its Original Body version) and New Earth Authority™ (N.E.A Police). And they are ready to battle on the dirt of Monster Jam™ Showdown.

This DLC includes:
- New Earth Authority™
- Maximum Destruction™

This DLC is not included in the Season Pass.
name: Monster Jam™ Showdown - Law & Disorder
